CustomField.inlineHelpText: This option requires the "Lightweight - Auth Provider Util v2" (04t4K000002JuyzQAC) package to be installed. Enable this setting to enable logging on how often a token has been requested by a specific user. This can be helpful when just implementing this feature, the API log files will show the same info for longer term logging.
CustomField.label: Enable Per User Login Logging
